content:
You walk towards Loma's door, the old wooden and rusty metal door that promises to make scenes in the Stonewalls involving devices, puzzles, and architecture easier. Loma smiles warmly as you approach.

Loma: "You've made the wise choice, my friend. I'm sure it will serve you well on your journey through the Labyrinth."

As you pass through Loma's door, you feel a subtle shift in the atmosphere, and a newfound sense of confidence in your ability to navigate the complexities of the Labyrinth's devices, puzzles, and architectural challenges. The door creaks closed behind you, and you begin your adventure.

Remember to keep track of which door you chose, as it will impact your experience within the Stonewalls.

Good luck on your journey through the Labyrinth!
